name: overwitched
description:
Thanks for playing!

This game is heavily inspired by Overcooked from Ghost Town Games. If you don't know Overcooked you must try it. Really. It is awesome. So buy the game, grab a bunch of friends and a cozy couch. You will not regret it.  :)

We mainly wanted to try out the Godot engine. So we just made something inspired by an existing game we really like.

Code  
hagish, kray-c

Art
kray-c

Sound
Some public domain effects mainly from OpenGameArt.org.

Music Some public domain music from OpenGameArt.org.

Controls:

Player 1: WASD + Q to interact

Player 2: Arrows + Space to interact
